Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder section of a drab-coloured pottery wine-jar, interior slightly grooved, with traces of three lines of black-painted hieratic text on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393095) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393095)
Associated places: Named in inscription: House of Aten
